user_data.target_needs: The main need I wanted to fulfill was comfort and support in undergarments, especially after my breast reduction, which required a more accommodating fit.
purchase_reason: I made this purchase primarily for comfort after undergoing a significant change in my body. The lightweight and soft cotton material, along with the tank style design, provided the support I needed without the discomfort of traditional bras. The ability to wear it throughout the day and even while sleeping was a crucial factor in my decision.

I was drawn to this product due to its front close design and the promise of comfort and support for an active lifestyle. However, my experience was disappointing because the stiff plastic under the hook made it uncomfortable, leading me to return it. My decision was influenced by the product's description and my expectations for comfort.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer comfortable, soft, and well-fitting clothing that is easy to wear and maintain. I value products that are made from high-quality materials, such as cotton blends, and I appreciate features like tag-free designs and stretchy fabrics that allow for ease of movement. I also tend to favor items that fit true to size and provide a flattering silhouette. On the other hand, I dislike products that are uncomfortable, poorly constructed, or do not meet my expectations in terms of quality and fit. I am particularly sensitive to issues like tight waistbands, lack of support, and materials that do not feel good against my skin.

conversation.content: I want to find undergarments that provide comfort and support, especially after my breast reduction surgery. within my expected price range: [10.25, 26.0]
What specific style or type of undergarments are you looking for post breast reduction surgery?
I need ["Clothing Shoes & Jewelry", "Women", "Clothing", "Lingerie Sleep & Lounge", "Lingerie"] category products.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Bali womens Passion for Comfort Minimizer Bra, Full-coverage Underwire Bra, Seamless Cups> / Item ID: B087KBMV6D / Price: $21.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Bali's Passion for Comfort® minimizer underwire bra delivers on its promise, minimizing your profile by up to 1.5 inches in sublime comfort for everyday wear. The key to comfort lies in the hidden underwire that lifts gently but efficiently. You'll appreciate the seamless cups and silky fabric that disappear under tees and other clingy clothes for the smooth, sleek look you want. Side and back panels plus straps with front contouring provide even more no-bulge smoothing. This minimizer underwire bra is available in sizes 32C to 44G so you're sure to find the size that works for you."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Ultimate Underwire Bra, Low-Cut T-Shirt Bra, Convertible Underwire Bra, Convertible Underwire T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0C3LS6FZX / Price: $10.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Say hello to smooth comfort with Hanes®' low-cut, underwire T-shirt bra. The T-shirt-soft knit fabric virtually disappears under clingy clothes for the smooth, seamless look you want. Offering moderate coverage, its plunging front contours will be welcomed by all the different necklines in your wardrobe. The underwire construction is super comfortable and detailed with a stretch front band that helps keep the cups in place. Lightly lined foam cups have inside concealing petals for a no-show look. You'll love the moisture-wicking properties of the soft knit ComfortBlend® lining that helps keep you cool and dry. And to top it all off, the straps convert from straight traditional to racerback styling for even more fashion flexibility. There are lots of reasons that this is one of Hanes' favorite underwire T-shirt bras."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Bali Womens Satin Tracings Minimizer Bra, Maximum Support Underwire Bra, Df3562> / Item ID: B0BQYPZBKM / Price: $21.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["One of the country's bestselling minimizer bras, Bali®'s Satin Tracings® underwire minimizer bra is ingeniously designed to slim your bustline by as much as 1 3/4 inches. Best of all, it flatters without flattening, helping your clothes fit better while celebrating your curves. Cushion-tipped underwires provide maximum support with no-poke comfort. Support is further enhanced by seamed, non-stretch cups that provide a little extra lift. The underwire minimizer bra's non-stretch straps help alleviate shoulder pressure and their Comfort-U® design keeps them comfortably in place. You'll love the smooth satin and jacquard print fabrics that are oh-so pretty as they provide the minimizing support you want."]
